events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further assessment.
A recruiter specializing in software development has been assigned to manage your application process.
Your qualifications match our requirements, so we are conducting an initial screening interview soon.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the initial screening interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM via video call.
The technical interview was completed successfully; the feedback from the panel is very encouraging.
We have scheduled an HR interview for you on May 10th at 3:00 PM to discuss further steps.
Your HR interview was completed today; you demonstrated excellent alignment with company culture.
We are pleased to offer you the position of Software Engineer with a competitive compensation package.
Thank you for your positive feedback and eagerness to join our engineering team.
You have officially accepted our offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started with sessions planned to integrate you fully into the team.
The hiring process is now successfully closed with you joining the engineering department today.
